name: sentry
description: Sentry is an application monitoring and error tracking platform for web, mobile, and backend services. It captures exceptions, performance data, and alerts, and can be deployed self-hosted or consumed as a SaaS.
features: Error tracking: Captures and aggregates exceptions from web, mobile, and backend applications.
Performance monitoring: Tracks transaction traces, slow queries, and bottlenecks across services.
Release tracking: Associates errors with specific releases for regression detection.
Source maps: Deobfuscates minified JavaScript errors with automatic source map support.
Breadcrumbs: Records user actions and events leading up to errors for context.
Issue grouping: Automatically groups similar errors to reduce noise and prioritize fixes.
Alert rules: Configures notifications based on error frequency, severity, or custom conditions.
Team collaboration: Assign issues, add comments, and track resolution progress.
Integration ecosystem: Connects with Slack, Jira, GitHub, and dozens of other tools.
Custom tags: Add metadata to events for filtering and analysis by environment, user, or feature.
Performance insights: Identifies slow database queries, API calls, and rendering issues.
User feedback: Collects user reports directly from error pages for additional context.
